subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Two days after being hospitalized because of a panic attack, Charlie Beljan won the Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals Classic in Lake Buena Vista, Fla., for his first PGA Tour victory.
snippet: Two days after being hospitalized because of a panic attack, Charlie Beljan won the Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals Classic in Lake Buena Vista, Fla., for his first PGA Tour victory.
